sentence.Network_en: All glories to Lord Balarama, the son of rohini.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有荣耀归于主巴拉茹阿玛, 柔黑妮的儿子.

sentence.Network_en: Traditionally Balarama wears blue garments and a garland of forest flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 传统上说,巴拉胡米穿上蓝色的皮肤,拥有一个由森林之花组成的花环.

sentence.Network_en: All glories to rama - ghata, where Lord Balarama performed His rasa dance.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有荣耀归于茹阿玛噶塔, 主巴拉茹阿玛上演了他的茹阿萨之舞.

means.word_mean: 1. elder brother of Krishna; an incarnation of Vishnu

baesInfo.translate_result: balaam巴兰（美索不达米亚的一先知）
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
